title: County lines gang crackdown in drug policy overhaul
content: A 10-year drug strategy will also see increased investment in treatment and recovery, the government says.

title: National review launched after Arthur murder
content: Lessons will be learnt to protect other children from such evil crimes, the government says.

title: Parliament drug use claims to be raised with police
content: Commons Speaker Sir Lindsay Hoyle says allegations of cocaine taking are "deeply concerning".

title: Levelling-up report likely to be delayed to 2022
content: Labour accuses the government of being in "disarray", but ministers promise to tackle regional inequality.

title: Longest-serving Labour MP to step down
content: Barry Sheerman says he is looking forward to spending more time with his family.

title: Storm Arwen power cuts unacceptable, minister says
content: The electricity supplier for the North East says thousands of homes are still without power.

title: Travel changes too late to stop Omicron - scientist
content: The return of pre-departure Covid tests for travellers to the UK will come into force on Tuesday.
